titles.title: To provide for a study on the protection of Native American seeds and traditional foods, and for other purposes.
Native American Seeds Protection Act of 2019
Native American Seeds Protection Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Natural Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
